promptTemplates.default: A hyperrealistic 4K professional photograph of a dark Chicago warehouse interior in the 90s. No perceivable people, only silhouettes and fog, lit by strobing light and ambient haze. Industrial, analog textures. Cinematic realism.
promptTemplates.thumbnail: Atmospheric street-level graffiti wall in Chicago at night, cinematic framing, muted tones with neon spray accents, analog photo grain
promptTemplates.intro: Ambient warehouse intro with analog textures, light flickers, soft motion design, archival typography using {accentColor}
promptTemplates.outro: Faded black frame with logo watermark, timestamp overlay, ambient background tone, and light grain
